definition: to lie idle (of arable land)/fig. rusty because of lack of practice
to throw/to toss/to fling/to cast/to abandon

sentences.english: That is why farmers can benefit from policies that induce them to leave land fallow .
sentences.chinese: 這就是農民會從“拋荒政策”中得益的原因。

sentences.english: Comparative quality of life dwindles and land is often abandoned.
sentences.chinese: 生活質量相對下降，土地往往被拋荒。
